pages.text: $(li)The Smoker is a variant of the Furnace specialized in cooking.
$(li)The Smoker is twice as fast as the common Furnace.

$(li)First you have to place the Smoker and right click in it.$(br)$(li)Now you have to insert the Fuel in the second slot, the most common fuel are Wood, Charcoal, Coal, Coal Blocks, Lava Bucket, Blaze Rod and finally Blaze Lanterns.$(br)$(li)Then you need to place the item to cook in the first slot.
$(li)Finally you can pick up the result and add it into your inventory.
